content:
The 8472 said:

Sometimes I see an issue with those green labels on stuff I am familiar with and could solve but then I'm not a starter either, so I'm not sure if I should leave them or not.

One middle ground option would be to put a write-up in the issue and mark it E-mentor. (It's great fun watching people show up out of the woodwork for easy+mentor things like #91867 )

But at the same time, if you're particularly inspired by something or want it to happen faster or think it'll be trickier than predicted or something, then I don't think you should hold back from working on it.
